prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Drums, Guitar, Strings, Reed, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Drums, Guitar, Strings, and Reed, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Drums, Guitar, Strings, and Reed, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
This composition is Piano, Drums, Guitar, Strings, and Reed, Bass excluded.
